column3: â€œOne bong rip had me good an on my ass for about two hours. This strain is very potent. It has an aroma of citrus and cat urine/ammonia. Very high odor, even in my top dresser drawer the entire second floor reeked of bud. Glass vials a must when transporting or storing. Fast acting strain, was completely stoned within a few minutes. Main effect is a serious case of the tinglies. A very pleasant experience. However, be...â€
â€œThe sativa feels like it last forever, but has an awsome euphoric feel, and the indica creeps up on you, in a good wayâ€

â€œWow!
This stuff is dynamite.
To start with, the smell is a sweet funky orange. 
Aroma: 10/10

The hairs are incredible orange and are sticking up. The large, evergreen tree shaped buds are laden with sugar crystals and are topped with what appears to be a solid piece of rock candy. 
Appearance: 11/10

The flavor is similar to giving a BJ to the Chillie WillieÂ® penguin.
Imagine eating a mouthful of orange koolaide pow...â€

â€œOrange Haze is cross of Orange Bud & Haze.

Orange Haze has dark frosty green buds with a smell of orange pine and citrus good uplifting high makes you think alot and makes u feel really happy and euphoric.â€
â€œI feel focused but anxious and paranoid.  An uncomfortable sense of detachment creeps in unless I am being mentally active or distracted by something.  Does not help my insomnia.â€

â€œI got a local homegrown dro" version of Orange Haze here in Dallas and the smell was citrusy but not the normal pungency you get from Colorado weed. â€œLoaded this right after my roommates and I finished a bowl of Black Widow. This particular strain most certainly made up for what Black Widow lacked, and that's a more prominent body high. This is what a hybrid is suppose to feel like.â€
